  1 | # HVAC Mikro-Pakiety - Plan Migracji
  2 | ## "Pasja rodzi profesjonalizm" - Migration Strategy
  3 | 
  4 | ## üöÄ Etapy Migracji
  5 | 
  6 | ### ‚úÖ ETAP 1: hvac-core (COMPLETED)
  7 | **Status**: ‚úÖ Zako≈Ñczony
  8 | **Czas**: ~2h
  9 | **Rezultat**: 500KB bundle size
 10 | 
 11 | **Wykonane dzia≈Çania**:

106 | ## üìã Checklist Migracji
107 | 
108 | ### Pre-Migration Checklist
109 | - [x] Backup obecnej struktury
110 | - [x] Analiza zale≈ºno≈õci
111 | - [x] Plan architektury
112 | - [x] Bundle size targets
113 | 
114 | ### Per-Package Checklist
115 | **Dla ka≈ºdego pakietu**:
116 | - [ ] Utworzenie struktury folder√≥w
117 | - [ ] Konfiguracja package.json
118 | - [ ] Konfiguracja tsconfig.json
119 | - [ ] Przeniesienie komponent√≥w
120 | - [ ] Aktualizacja import√≥w
121 | - [ ] Testowanie build
122 | - [ ] Bundle size verification
123 | - [ ] Integration testing
124 | 
125 | ### Post-Migration Checklist
126 | - [ ] Wszystkie pakiety dzia≈ÇajƒÖ
127 | - [ ] Bundle size < 4.7MB
128 | - [ ] Performance tests pass
129 | - [ ] E2E tests pass
130 | - [ ] Production deployment ready
131 | 
132 | ## üîÑ Migration Commands
133 | 
134 | ### 1. Tworzenie nowego pakietu
135 | ```bash
136 | # Struktura pakietu
137 | mkdir -p packages/hvac-{name}/src
138 | cd packages/hvac-{name}
139 | 
140 | # Package configuration
141 | cat > package.json << EOF
142 | {
143 |   "name": "hvac-{name}",
144 |   "version": "0.1.0",
145 |   "main": "dist/index.js",
146 |   "types": "dist/index.d.ts",
147 |   "dependencies": {
148 |     "hvac-core": "workspace:*",
149 |     "twenty-ui": "workspace:*"
150 |   }
151 | }
152 | EOF
153 | 
154 | # TypeScript configuration
155 | cat > tsconfig.json << EOF
156 | {
157 |   "extends": "../../tsconfig.base.json",
158 |   "compilerOptions": {
159 |     "module": "commonjs"
160 |   }
161 | }
162 | EOF
163 | ```
164 | 
165 | ### 2. Przenoszenie komponent√≥w
166 | ```bash
167 | # Przeniesienie folder√≥w
168 | mv packages/twenty-front/src/modules/hvac/components/{folder} \
169 |    packages/hvac-{name}/src/components/
170 | 
171 | # Aktualizacja import√≥w
172 | find packages/hvac-{name} -name "*.tsx" -o -name "*.ts" | \
173 | xargs sed -i 's|from '\''../../|from '\''hvac-core|g'
174 | ```
175 | 
176 | ### 3. Testowanie bundle size
177 | ```bash
178 | # Build pakietu
179 | cd packages/hvac-{name}
180 | npm run build
181 | 
182 | # Analiza rozmiaru
183 | du -sh dist/
184 | ```
185 | 
186 | ## üéØ Success Metrics
187 | 
188 | ### Bundle Size Targets
189 | - [x] hvac-core: 500KB ‚úÖ
190 | - [ ] hvac-dashboard: 800KB üîÑ
191 | - [ ] hvac-analytics: 1.2MB (lazy) üìÖ
192 | - [ ] hvac-equipment: 600KB üìÖ
193 | - [ ] hvac-scheduling: 700KB üìÖ
194 | - [ ] hvac-customers: 600KB üìÖ
195 | - [ ] **TOTAL MAIN**: < 500KB üéØ
196 | - [ ] **TOTAL LAZY**: < 4.2MB üéØ
197 | 
198 | ### Performance Targets
199 | - [ ] Initial load time: < 2s
200 | - [ ] Lazy component load: < 500ms
201 | - [ ] Search debounce: 300ms
202 | - [ ] Bundle optimization: > 80% reduction
203 | 
204 | ### Quality Targets
205 | - [ ] TypeScript: 0 errors
206 | - [ ] ESLint: 0 warnings
207 | - [ ] Tests: 100% critical path coverage
208 | - [ ] E2E: All user journeys pass
209 | 
210 | ## üö® Risk Mitigation
211 | 
212 | ### Potential Issues
213 | 1. **Import Dependencies**: Circular dependencies miƒôdzy pakietami
214 |    - **Solution**: Strict dependency rules, tylko hvac-core jako shared
215 | 
216 | 2. **Bundle Size Overflow**: Pakiety przekraczajƒÖ limity
217 |    - **Solution**: Continuous monitoring, aggressive lazy loading
218 | 
219 | 3. **TypeScript Errors**: Broken imports po migracji
220 |    - **Solution**: Incremental migration, proper type exports
221 | 
222 | 4. **Performance Regression**: Slower loading po refactor
223 |    - **Solution**: Performance testing, optimization
224 | 
225 | ### Rollback Plan
226 | 1. **Git branches**: Ka≈ºdy etap w osobnej ga≈Çƒôzi
227 | 2. **Backup**: Pe≈Çny backup przed migracjƒÖ
228 | 3. **Incremental**: Mo≈ºliwo≈õƒá rollback pojedynczych pakiet√≥w
229 | 4. **Testing**: Comprehensive testing przed merge
230 | 
231 | ## üéâ Expected Results
232 | 
233 | Po zako≈Ñczeniu migracji:
234 | - ‚úÖ **Bundle size**: < 4.7MB (cel osiƒÖgniƒôty!)
235 | - ‚úÖ **Performance**: Znacznie szybsze ≈Çadowanie
236 | - ‚úÖ **Maintainability**: Modularny, ≈Çatwy w utrzymaniu kod
237 | - ‚úÖ **Scalability**: ≈Åatwe dodawanie nowych funkcji
238 | - ‚úÖ **Developer Experience**: Lepsze DX dziƒôki modularno≈õci
239 | 
240 | **"Pasja rodzi profesjonalizm"** - Ka≈ºdy pakiet to perfekcyjnie zoptymalizowany element! üöÄ

</file_content>
